alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 01 at 4:36AM PDT until September 01 at 7:45AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... The York Burn Area in... San Bernardino County in southern California... * Until 745 AM PDT. * At 436 AM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain over the York Burn Area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding in and around the York Burn Area. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of areas in and around the York Burn Area. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... York Burn Area. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
